pullrequest.title: implement screw joint in simbody and clean up screw joint constraint in ode

content.raw: In fact, substantial changes in the base code invalidate much all the testing done previous to them. I agree with Steve, prefer 2 or 3 smaller pull requests, are quite easier to handle and if during the testing an issue arises that needs major changes, new pull request to handle it.
content.html: In fact, substantial changes in the base code invalidate much all the testing done previous to them. I agree with Steve, prefer 2 or 3 smaller pull requests, are quite easier to handle and if during the testing an issue arises that needs major changes, new pull request to handle it.
